TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoleProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: 继承 抽象类的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的角色提供程序是由类的属性以只读方式公开的 。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定角色提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使你能够在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的角色信息，以及访问不属于抽象类的角色提供程序的自定义成员 。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序以及其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

related.span: 了解 ASP.NET 角色管理

summary.span: 将角色提供程序集合复制到一维数组中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用将 角色提供程序对象复制到指定的数组。This method uses to copy role provider objects to the specified array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将的 内容复制 到对象的数组中 。The following code example uses the method to copy the contents of a to an array of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的角色提供程序是由类的属性以只读方式公开的 。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定角色提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使你能够在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的角色信息，以及访问不属于抽象类的角色提供程序的自定义成员 。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 按名称从类的属性访问为应用程序配置的 。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
